name: Diver Dan (Big Southerly Games)
description:
Strap on your fins, grab a diving mask and join Diver Dan for an exciting underwater adventure! But be warned the oceans depths can be a hostile and unforgiving environment.

Beneath the surface of the deep blue ocean danger lurks behind every strand of kelp. In this adventure Diver Dan will need to be mentally focused with lightning quick reflexes if he is going to make it through the work day in this fast paced action game.

Game Features:

  • Sixteen levels of challenging subaquatic fun.
  • Two "power moves" available to help keep Diver Dan alive. These are the "Power Kick" and the "Stunned Mullet".
  • Random in game power ups and bonuses.
  • A variety of obstacles and enemies to keep a player on their toes.
  • Absolutely no in app purchases to ruin the fun!
